works.description:
Dear Google Team!

Awaztoday.com is stealing our website content from long time. Kindly ban awaztoday.com on google search.

Article-1
SC told new Contempt Law based on mischief
ISLAMABAD: A noted lawyer has argued in the Supreme Court that absurdity can’t be attributed to the legislature for enacting the Contempt of Court Act 2012 though it appears that a draftsman representing 180 people doesn’t know what exactly the law of the land is.
http://www.thenews.com.pk/Todays-News-13-16431-SC-told-new-Contempt-Law-based-on-mischief

Article-2
Outages in Punjab result of vindictive attitude: Shahbaz 
LAHORE: Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif on Sunday said the 18-hour-long spells of loadshedding in the Punjab were the result of President Asif Ali Zardari’s malice and vengeful attitude towards the people of the province.
http://www.thenews.com.pk/Todays-News-13-16429-Outages-in-Punjab-result-of-vindictive-attitude-Shahbaz

Article-3
PPP will form govt in all provinces including Punjab: Zardari 
SUKKUR: President Asif Ali Zardari on Sunday predicted that the next chief minister of Punjab would be from the Pakistan People's Party (PPP), and that the party would rule the entire country in the aftermath of the upcoming election, forming governments in all the four provinces.
http://www.thenews.com.pk/Todays-News-13-16426-PPP-will-form-govt-in-all-provinces-including-Punjab-Zardari
